name: Indian Institute of Science & Technology
description:
I was selected among top students out of hundreds of applications from all over India to attend school at Computer Science and Automation department where I got the opportunity to attend various talks, demos, and hands-on sessions by the institute faculty, research scholars and industry experts covering theoretical and applied aspects of computer science.
